name: Shade (Quend0)
description:
Shade is a fast paced, 1 on 1, multiplayer dueling game. It was created by Brendan Richards using the Phaser javascript game engine. It features randomized, procedural level generation, meaning the level you face your opponents in will never be the same twice. Please report any bugs/issues to quend00@gmail.com. The game is available to play for free but if you enjoy it please consider donating to its creator.

Controls:

Move Left: A
Move Right: D
Jump: Spacebar
Change Weapon: E
Sword Attack 1: Left Click
Sword Attack 2: Right Click
Downward Sword Attack: S + Left Click (while in air)
Shoot Bow: Left Click (Hold and Release)

Credits:

Created by: Brendan Richards

Background image modified from: https://edermunizz.itch.io/pixel-art-snowy-forest

Level Terrain modified from: https://opengameart.org/content/minimalist-pixel-tileset

character assets modified from: https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero
